name: Crypt Hunter (itch)
description:
Deep within a flame lit crypt, search for ancient treasures hidden. Navigate through traps, deadly enviroment and make sure you make it out alive.

Crypt Hunter is a small game but you will be playing for hours trying to survive. As its a small game we added a small price tag, plus its the first game from us at Robax Games. From here we will only get bigger and better.
